message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. This gives us both a good share.
I think we can do a little better to split things more evenly. This offer accounts for the time value of money.
It seems like you're trying to take advantage of the inflation, Bob. This is my counter-offer, and it's important to reach an agreement soon.
Alice, let's be fair. A 50/50 split makes the most sense.  We both lose if this drags on.
